errorMessage: {{Select1Copy.selectedOptionValue=='pan' && Input2Copy.isValid==false?"Length/Format of Individual PAN is Invalid. If entered in lower character please erase and enter in upper character":""}}
label: Document Number
validation: {{(Select1Copy.selectedOptionValue==='pan' && (get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution==='85 - Private Limited Company' || get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution==='86 - Public Limited Company'))?((Input2Copy.text.length==10)&&(/[A-Z]{3}[C]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{4}[A-Z]{1}$/.test(Input2Copy.text))):(Select1Copy.selectedOptionValue==='pan' && (get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution==='53 - PARTNERSHIP FIRMS' || get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution==='89 - Limited Liability Partnership'))?((Input2Copy.text.length==10)&&(/[A-Z]{3}[F]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{4}[A-Z]{1}$/.test(Input2Copy.text))):(Select1Copy.selectedOptionValue==='pan' && get_org_constitution.data[0].constitution==='84 - Sole Proprietorship')?((Input2Copy.text.length==10)&&(/[A-Z]{3}[P]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{4}[A-Z]{1}$/.test(Input2Copy.text))):''}}
